What We Do

What Is PlatWorks?

PlatWorks is an AI‑software engineering firm focused on operational optimization. We identify where your team is losing time to manual workflows and implement custom AI systems that eliminate those bottlenecks.

Workflow Mapping & Inefficiency Analysis

We map your critical workflows to identify exactly where time, cost, and accuracy are leaking.

ROI-Driven AI Automation Design

Every system we design starts with measurable ROI targets, not technology for technology's sake.

Custom Software Implementation

Purpose-built software and AI systems, architected for your specific operational needs.

Direct Integration with Existing Tools

Seamless connection with your CRM, ERP, and internal stack. No rip-and-replace required.

Ongoing Optimization Support

Continuous refinement and performance tuning so your systems improve alongside your business.

The Problem

Most Companies Run on Invisible Drag.

Manual reporting.
Repetitive data entry.
Fragmented tools.
Approval bottlenecks.
Customer follow-ups handled manually.

These inefficiencies compound quietly — reducing speed, accuracy, and growth potential.

We quantify that drag.

Then we remove it.

Our process starts by measuring the real cost of operational friction — in hours, dollars, and error rates. Then we design and implement targeted AI systems that eliminate the root cause.

We build, integrate, and deploy automation systems that deliver measurable ROI from day one.

Most clients recover 15–25% of operational time within months.
